Test Name: Trypanosoma cruzi IgG, Lateral Flow Assay
Purpose: To detect Trypanosoma cruzi IgG antibodies in serum using a lateral flow assay.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or red-top tube (no anticoagulant)
Equipment: Trypanosoma cruzi IgG lateral flow assay kit, calibrated micropipettes with tips, timer
